--- In gladiator@y..., "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@y...> 
wrote:
> Once again, I'm asking for opinions (this time based of a 
suggestion) 
> on the tournament issues by taking a poll.

In case anyone is confused about what the poll is about, here's an 
explanation:

Voting for integrity is about allowing minimial cheating, at the 
expense of less time.

Voting for time is not voting against having any integrity but about 
allowing more time, which could result in more cheating.
